# kubernetesx Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "kubernetesx" {
  config_path = "~/.kube/config"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `config_path` (String) Path to kubeconfig
